description: Retrieves the specified revocation file. This action returns a pre-signed S3 URI which is active for ten minutes.

parameters.name: TrustStoreArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the trust store.

parameters.name: RevocationId
parameters.description: The revocation ID of the revocation file.

nested_items.name: Location
nested_items.description: The revocation files Amazon S3 URI.
